title: Top Secret
description:
Now you need to create yourself. Go to Postman at top of your screen
Select PUT type
Write Player in the endpoint nama
in the body include x to be -6
y should be -4
 and finally don't forget to include what is your name

helpo.message: Good job! You figured out the camera controlls!
Before we start doing some magic you need add your own personal API token to Pipeman
Before I tell you what it is, keep in mind that you should never share you token with anyone!
This token gives access to everything!
